files.description: Defines a single resolved OUTPUT_DIR and provides ensure_dir, write_text, and write_json helpers for consistent artifact output across the project.
Tests OUTPUT_DIR resolution and the ensure_dir/write_text/write_json helpers including environment variable override behavior.
Documents the unified outputs directory convention, the OUTPUT_DIR environment variable, and recommended usage patterns in pipelines/experiments/tests.
CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs unit tests to enforce the unified outputs resolver behavior across changes.

missionDescription: Implement a single outputs resolver (e.g., OUTPUT_DIR = Path(os.getenv('OUTPUT_DIR', './outputs')).resolve()) used everywhere; add a small helper (ensure_dir, write_json, write_text) and refactor pipeline/experiments/tests to use it exclusively.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Standardizing all writes to repo-relative ./outputs/ prevents permission/path failures (e.g., absolute /outputs) and ensures every run produces auditable artifacts in the canonical location required b...
